1️⃣ Bitwise submitted a Form S-1 to the U.S. SEC for launching its proposed Bitwise $NEAR ETF.

7️⃣ Michael Saylor predicted #BTC's market cap would reach $200 trillion.

8️⃣ Public company KULR acquired $4 million worth of $BTC.

9️⃣ The UK Treasury rejected the idea of a national #Bitcoin reserve, stating the U.S. model wasn’t suitable.

🔟 The Kenyan High Court ordered Sam Altman’s #Worldcoin project to delete all biometric data due to consent violations.

1️⃣1️⃣ Arizona’s SB 1373 #BitcoinReserve Bill passed the Senate and moved to Governor Hobbs after a previous veto.

1️⃣2️⃣ Coinbase became the exclusive #Crypto partner for #RiotGames’ League of Legends and Valorant esports, enhancing fan experiences with blockchain rewards.
